job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout TrueraltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtTruera provides the first AI Quality platform to help enterprises analyze machine learning improve model quality and build trust Powered by enterpriseclass Artificial Intelligence AI Explainability technology based on six years of research at Carnegie Mellon University Trueras platform helps eliminate the black box surrounding widely used AI and ML technologies This visibility leads to higher quality explainable models that achieve measurable business results address unfair bias and ensure governance and complianceltbrgtltbrgtWe are excited about the amazing team were building at Truera One of the core cultural principles at Truera is Create whats not there Were building a team of creatorbuilders who are excited about our mission and keen to build largescale systems and drive cuttingedge research in support of itltbrgtltbrgtWe are a rapidly growing Series A company funded by Greylock and Wing and working with both Fortune 100 customers and startups throughout the worldltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The JobltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a Software Engineer on the TruEra platform team you will be designing building and managing a scalable and highly available microservice platform AIML infrastructure ecosystems Were developing the platform for both public and private cloud environments with the container as firstclass citizens Infrastructure is at the core of our platform and were constantly innovating to make our systems more performant timely costeffective and capable while maintaining high reliability Youll be architecting our core data and ML infrastructure and pipelinesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDesign develop platform features ltligtltligtCollaborate with ML Engineers Frontend Engineers and Products Managers to deliver new Platform capabilityltligtltligtParticipate in early customer engagements and PoCsltligtltligtCreate whats not thereltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPrior ExperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBS in Computer Science or equivalentltligtltligtExperience with Java  Scala Python is preferredltligtltligtPassion for delivering products endtoend from ideation through planning and scoping to implementation ltligtltligtExperience or desire to work on machine learning systems ltligtltligtSolid background in the fundamentals of computer science and distributed systemsltligtltligtExperience or desire to work collaboratively in crossfunctional teams with design product data science and infrastructure teamsltligtltligtExperience in containerized deployment or Kubernetes is a plusltligtltligtAdvocate for the continuous deployment and automation tools monitoring and selfhealing systemsltligtltligtGreat communication skills and a team playerltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtHiceToHavesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience building machine learning models or ecosystemsltligtltligtHaving been a part of an engineering team at an early stage startupltbrgtltligtltulgtAny unsolicited resumescandidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of Truera are considered property of Truera and are not subject to payment of agency feesltbrgtltbrgtltemgtBy submitting your interest in this job you agree to
